Map037.Event[89].Page[1].list.message[0]: "I'm Cahara of the South, a mercenary at your service."
Map037.Event[89].Page[1].list.message[3]: "I do have a mission here, but let's save that story for
Map037.Event[89].Page[1].list.message[5]: "I was caught by one of those malformed prison guards..."
Map037.Event[89].Page[1].list.message[7]: Your conversation took an awkward turn for some reason...
Map037.Event[89].Page[2].list.message[0]: "Uhh... I'm feeling kind of weak after being left here
Map037.Event[89].Page[2].list.message[1]: "Would you mind if we traveled together for a while?"
Map037.Event[89].Page[2].list.message[5]: "Eeh, except there doesn't seem to be room in your party."
Map037.Event[89].Page[2].list.message[6]: "Well, I guess I can manage on my own too, no worries."
Map037.Event[89].Page[2].list.message[7]: "Don't let the dungeon have its way with you. Bye."
Map037.Event[89].Page[2].list.message[9]: "Eeh, fine. I guess I'll manage on my own then."
Map037.Event[89].Page[2].list.message[10: "Don't let the dungeon have its way with you. Bye."

Map037.Event[89].Page[4].list.message[5]: No reaction. But it is satisfying.
